CMultiXException Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is used when the application calls the Throw() macro. When Throw() is called, it creates an instance of this class and calls the C++ throw statement with this class as a parameter.


Public Attributes

std::string m_File
 File name where the exception occured.
int m_Line
 Line number where the exception occured.
std::string m_Text
 Error text used.
